design_philosophy.description: A production-ready POS system that feels like a command center. Dark, rich navs paired with high-clarity workspaces.

headings.usage: All headings (h1-h6). Use tight tracking (-0.02em) for sizes above 24px.

body.usage: All body text, inputs, and data tables. Optimized for legibility at small sizes.

mono.usage: Transaction IDs, SKU codes, and financial data.

layout.spacing_scale: Generous. Use p-6 or p-8 for cards. Gap-6 for grids.

cards.style: bg-white border border-slate-100 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-200

inputs.style: bg-slate-50 border-slate-200 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-teal-500/20 focus:border-teal-500 transition-all

tables.header: bg-slate-50 text-slate-500 uppercase text-xs font-bold tracking-wider

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Install 'clsx' and 'tailwind-merge' if not present for dynamic classes.
2. THEME: Implement the 'Dark Blue + Teal' theme by overriding the CSS variables in index.css first.
3. LAYOUT: Create a 'DashboardLayout' component that includes the Sidebar and Topbar. Wrap all app pages (Dashboard, POS, Inventory, etc.) in this layout.
4. POS PAGE: This is the core feature. It must be a split screen: Left side = Product Grid (3 cols), Right side = Cart/Checkout (fixed width 400px).
5. MOCK DATA: Create a robust 'mockData.js' file with at least 20 products and 10 recent transactions using the images provided.
6. CHARTS: Use Recharts for the Dashboard. Style them to match the theme (Teal lines, Slate axis).
7. LANDING PAGE: Make it distinct from the app. Use a dark hero section with the 'landing_hero' image as a subtle background overlay or side visual.
8. ANIMATION: Add subtle entrance animations to the dashboard cards using framer-motion or simple CSS keyframes.
universal_guidelines: Do not use generic 'Inter' font. Import Manrope and Plus Jakarta Sans from Google Fonts.
Ensure all interactive elements have hover states.
Use 'data-testid' for all buttons and inputs.
Never use pure black (#000000). Use Slate-950 (#020617) instead.
